subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Lance Stephenson scored 14 points as Cincinnati beat Connecticut, 60-48, on Saturday in Hartford, spoiling the return of Huskies Coach Jim Calhoun from a three-and-a-half-week leave of absence.
snippet: Lance Stephenson scored 14 points as Cincinnati beat Connecticut, 60-48, on Saturday in Hartford, spoiling the return of Huskies Coach Jim Calhoun from a three-and-a-half-week leave of absence.
